forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 33F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 27F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 46F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 10C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 49F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 36F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
